name: DrupEX
description:
This is a simple drone-delivery puzzle 2D game where the player needs to find the destination of the packages by following the package address. The drone works with a signal source which is the truck. Be aware of the distance between the drone and the truck, if the drone gets to far from the truck it can be harmed. That's all for now. Thanks.

Developers:

Ronald Esquivel

Daniela Paniagua

Fabian Vives
